title: In the Girls Locker Room
description: There's a rumor that the girls keep a Kissing Book hidden in their locker room. In the book they judge how each boy in the grade kisses. Kyle and his friends have heard that someone has written some pretty bad things about them. Can it really be true? There's only one way to find out. They'll have to get that book. But to do it they'll have to go where no boy has gone before.
author: Todd Strasser
